FlowVariableView.name: FlowVariableView
FlowVariableView.description: Represents a variable within the flow version.

ApiName.description: The API name of the flow variable.

DataType.description: The data type of the flow variable. Valid values are: Apex—This value is available in API version 46.0 and later. Boolean Currency Date DateTime—This value is available in API version 30.0 and later. Number Multipicklist—This value is available in API version 34.0 and later. Picklist—This value is available in API version 34.0 and later. String sObject

Description.description: Flow variable information, specified by the org’s admin.

DurableId.description: The Id of the flow variable.

FlowVersionViewId.description: The Id of the flow version.

IsCollection.description: Indicates whether or not the flow variable is a collection of values.

IsInput.description: Indicated whether or not the flow variable is available for input.

IsOutput.description: Indicates whether or not the flow variable is available for output.

ObjectType.description: If the data type is sObject, this field indicates which object.
